channel.title: No audio at all (Had some problem with another source mod)
channel.description: Im going to assume this is not the games fault, but more of a software (Not hardware) issue on my end. Im using Logitech speakers and a subwoofer (Not sure of model but very generic) with realtek HD audio. Ive seen a few posts here about it on google but no one answered.

item.title: No audio at all (Had some problem with another source mod)
item.dc:creator: mshee32
item.description:
make sure you got a sound car and updated it

Read full topic

item.title: No audio at all (Had some problem with another source mod)
item.dc:creator: AJMedeiros
item.description:
Problem solved. I seriously dont know what I did, I launched the realtek audio manager and it started working after

Read full topic
item.source: No audio at all (Had some problem with another source mod)

item.title: No audio at all (Had some problem with another source mod)
item.dc:creator: AJMedeiros
item.description:
elivance:

Post your specs.

Are your drivers updated?

Have you tried to modify your audio configuration to simple stereo(no subwoofer)?

Sounds like an issue with Source 2007.

I remember when I was trying the other mod I had the same issue. I googled it and I read up that installing HL2E2 might possibly fix the issue but I was too lazy. Im gonna try that now

Gonna try the audio configs too

Read full topic
